text: Form up to better defend against enemy attacks
This is the honor of the Sons of the Reik, shining with radiant glory
Summon warhawks to assist in battle
Mark the enemy's position, making it easier for punishers to hit
The ultimate warrior unleashes their body's potential for a stronger charge and attack
The dark judges passes judgment on these sinners, forcing them to repent for their sins
The blade of vengeance swears an oath in blood to eradicate evil from the world
Warriors of Sigmar unleash soul-flame to strike nearby enemies
